original_title:
Infographic: How to Decode Food Labels & Ingredients..........
More than 73 percent of the U.S. food supply is ultra-processed. Let’s decipher what’s really in our food and what it does so we can make healthier choices.  — The Donald
article_summary: "More than 73% of U.S. food is ultra-processed. To make healthier choices, shop the perimeter of grocery stores, avoiding packaged and canned foods, and consider avoiding ingredients like Carrageenan."</s>
